# penguin_tencentcloud_virtual_machine_status (Data Source)

Read the latest VM status from `GET /tencentcloud/vms/:id/status`.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "penguin_tencentcloud_virtual_machine_status" "example" {
  id = "7f1f1e97-7f45-4c4b-94b4-2f1c248a8b1e"
}
```
